article.description: Tamarcio Wilson scored 22 points and Alcorn State never trailed in a 73-65 win over Arkansas-Pine Bluff on Monday night.
article.headline: Wilson's 22 leads Alcorn State past Ark Pine Bluff 73-65
article.linkText: Wilson's 22 leads Alcorn State past Ark Pine Bluff 73-65
article.story: PINE BLUFF, Ark. -- Tamarcio Wilson scored 22 points and Alcorn State never trailed in a 73-65 win over Arkansas-Pine Bluff on Monday night. The Braves led by as many as 11 points in the first half after Shawn Willett's layup with 3:20 left but they did not score again and had a four-point advantage at the break. UAPB tied it at 46-all with 13 minutes left, but Wilson's free throws gave Alcorn State a 56-49 lead and the Braves led by at least five points the rest of the way. Devonte Hampton added 14 points for Alcorn State (6-11, 4-2 SWAC) and Octavius Brown had 10 points, nine rebounds and three blocks. Alcorn State made more free throws (25 of 36) than Arkansas-Pine Bluff attempted (19 of 24). Ghiavonni Robinson led UAPB (3-16, 1-4) with a career-high 33 points. Robinson, made five 3-pointers and hit 8 of 10 free-throw attempts. Marquis Cunningham added 15 points.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
